page.title: 18Edlington Lollipop Lady.
page.content: Mrs Jean Burns was born in Edlo over 50 yrs ago,was schooled,married & raised her family here.She left school at 14 to work in an insurance office. She remembers the street parties after the war when bonfires melted the tarmac.She likes Edlo & its people & was impressed by the community spirit of the'84 miners strike when she and her retired husband supported their striking son.She has been our lollipop lady since 1970,though starting, without training in 1964.She carries a stop sign & wears white overalls,hat & wellies.The job requires good common sense.She calls foolish children"road hoppers".If ill,the police stand in. She works 12 h.p.w & is satisfied with her pay.She enjoys her fresh air job as it lets her meet people.She says children today have more money & stay up later but "Kids are still kids."
